Artificer: 2 chosen weapons, light crossbow, 20 bolts, chosen armor, thieves tools, dungeoneer's pack
Bard: Chosen weapon, a dagger, chosen instrument, leather armor, chosen adventuring pack
Cleric: 2 chosen weapons, chosen armor, a shield, a holy symbol, chosen adventuring pack
Druid: 2 chosen weapons/weapon and shield, leather armor, a druidic focus (a replacement for material cost of spells), explorer's pack
Fighter: Chosen weapons, chosen armor, chosen adventuring pack
